bp

Class Circuit

  • java.lang.Object
    • bp.Circuit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICircuit, IPermanentStorage

    public class Circuit
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICircuit, IPermanentStorage
    This is the business logic class for the circuit. This program allows the user to compute the voltage, amperage, or resistance of a given circuit.
    Author:
    MAXX
